[Home](./index.md) &gt; [doofinder](./doofinder.md) &gt; [Query](./doofinder.query.md)

## Query class

Allows creating a search query programmatically instead of creating the JSON and parameters by hand.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Query 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [copy()](./doofinder.query.copy.md) |  | Create a copy of the current query. |
|  [dump(validate)](./doofinder.query.dump.md) |  | Export the query as a params object. |
|  [getParam(name)](./doofinder.query.getparam.md) |  | Retrieve the value of a given parameter. |
|  [load(params)](./doofinder.query.load.md) |  | Configure the query with the provided params. |
|  [reset()](./doofinder.query.reset.md) |  | Reset the current query to the defaults. |
